metadata.title: Blues Stay Away

xml.lyrics:
Blues stay away from me
Oh blues, what don't you let me be
Don't know why
You keep on haunting me
Love never meant for me
Oh true love was never meant for me
Seem somehow
We never can agree
Life is full of misery
Oh dreams are like memories
Bringing back
The love that used to be
Tears, so many I can't see
Oh yes, don't mean a thing to me
Oh, don't go by
Still I can be free
(Trying out this banner exchange service)
